means: 向…提供错误的消息，误导( misinform的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He has been misinformed by members of his own party.
sentence.Network_cn: 他从自己党内成员那里得到了错误的消息。

sentence.Network_en: They were deliberately misinformed about their rights.
sentence.Network_cn: 有人故意向他们错误地说明了他们的权利。

sentence.Network_en: It became clear that the general had been badly misinformed.
sentence.Network_cn: 已经很清楚,将军得到的情报是严重失实的.

PerfectNetExp.abs: and by sowing distrust the environmental science community with his rhetoric , Lomborg has done a severe disservice not only to those scientists but also to the public he has misinformed .他以花言巧语挑拨大众对环境科学社群的信任，不只严重伤害到科学家，社会大众因他的错误讯息也得不到好处。

PerfectNetExp.exp: 作者提供的知识有错误
PerfectNetExp.abs: ...报纸又受到误传误导（misinformed）。」当今的媒体，花样繁多，除报纸 …3有错误 　13、 作者提供的知识有错误（misinformed）。 　14、 论述不合逻辑——推论无法让人信服 　15、 分析不够完整。4误导人【30】 我加上了「.
...…6咸饭被不适当告之　身处美国，倒是知道一点，那就是白衣咸饭被不适当告之（Misinformed）7弄错了克劳利（Joseph Crowley）昨日坚称自己对这些事一无所知，朗斯曼完全「弄错了」（misinformed）。史维斯坦则保持沉默。更多释义收起释义类别:来源:难度:1. 2. have 3. we keep.

list.abs: misinformation... ... fraudulent misinformation 恶意误报 misinformation effect 误导信息效应 distort misinformation 误报.
I guess I was totally misinformed when I learned about the birds and the bees ., 我猜我是完全错误的时候 , 我了解了鸟类和蜜蜂.
One method of spreading misinformation is the double agent ., 散布假情报的一种方法是双重间谍.
I guess I was totally misinformed when I learned about the birds and the bees ., 我猜我是完全错误的时候 , 我了解了鸟类和蜜蜂.

entry.def: If you are misinformed, you are told something that is wrong or inaccurate.

example.ex: He has been misinformed by members of his own party...
example.tran: 他从自己党内成员那里得到了错误的消息。
显然我们得到的消息是错误的。

auth_sentence.content: Please don't assume we're all similarly misinformed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Please don't assume we're all similarly misinformed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Please don't assume we're all similarly misinformed.

auth_sentence.content: When misinformed, is the public really convinced?
auth_sentence.res_content: When misinformed, is the public really convinced?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When misinformed, is the public really convinced?

auth_sentence.content: It also says many are misinformed about prevention and transmission.
auth_sentence.res_content: It also says many are misinformed about prevention and transmission.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It also says many are misinformed about prevention and transmission.
